DESCRIPTION: Dominican Agro-Exporter - Tranding Global Produce Rofim bridges Tropical & Oriental Produce to Global Markets. We supply international markets with fresh, high-quality fruits and vegetables grown under sustainable practices.

TAB_ORIENTAL.TAB_P: Exotic Vegetables: Asian Flavors, Premium Quality

TAB_ROOTS.TAB_P: Freshness and Flavor from the Earth

ABOUT.BANNER_P: Connecting Dominican quality produce with global markets through excellence and sustainability.

MAIN.MAIN_P1: Born from over 10 years of expertise in the handling, packaging, and distribution of fruits and vegetables, both domestically across the Dominican Republic and internationally to the United States, Europe, and the Caribbean.
MAIN.MAIN_P2: We continue to modernize our facilities through skilled personnel, efficient producers, and strategic partners, ensuring you receive the finest products from the Dominican Republic.

SECTION_PRINCIPLES.SECTION_TAGLINE: Guided by strong values and a clear vision, we're committed to excellence in every aspect of our business

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.P1: To provide the international market with fresh, high-quality fruits and vegetables, grown using sustainable practices. Ensuring food safety and the development of our local producers.
MISSION.P2: We commit to excellence at every stage of the process from planting to export to meet our clients' needs and contribute to the growth of the agricultural sector in the Dominican Republic.

VISION.TITLE: Our Vision
VISION.P1: To be the leading fruit and vegetable export company in the Caribbean, recognized for our innovation. We aspire to expand our global market presence, promote responsible agricultural development, and establish the Dominican Republic as a global reference in fresh produce exports.

CARD_1.TITLE: QUALITY
CARD_1.P: We guarantee fresh, healthy products that meet the highest international standards.

CARD_2.TITLE: COMMITMENT
CARD_2.P: We work with passion and responsibility to fulfill our clients’ and partners’ expectations.

CARD_3.TITLE: ETHICS & TRANSPARENCY
CARD_3.P: We operate with integrity in all business relationships, ensuring trust and credibility.

LEADERSHIP.LEADER_POSITION: President of Trading Global Produce Rofim
LEADERSHIP.LEADER_P: With over 10 years of experience in agricultural exports, Joe Mota leads our mission to bridge global markets with premium Dominican produce. His focus on innovation and strategic partnerships ensures efficient, reliable solutions for international clients.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Our Products
PRODUCTS.TAGLINE: We offer a wide range of products from different categories

CONTACT.TITLE: Your Fresh Produce Starts Here
CONTACT.TAGLINE: Visit our facilities in Las Cabuyas, La Vega, where quality and freshness meet excellence.

INFO.TITLE: Get In Touch With Us Now

LOCATION.TITLE: Location
LOCATION.P: Main street, Las Cabuyas, La Vega, Dominican Republic
